message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.IR. 

This paper is about neural machine translation (NMT) and its adaptation to human post-edits. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves machine learning algorithms and user studies, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the study involves human-computer interaction, which could be categorized under cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). Finally, the paper evaluates the performance of the NMT system using several evaluation metrics, which could be related to cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
